GWD (Ad Templates)\u003c/title\u003e\u003clink rel\u003d\"alternate\" type\u003d\"text/html\" href\u003d\"https://codecanyon.net/item/business-growth-banners-html5-gwd/17779746\" /\u003e\u003cauthor\u003e\u003cname\u003eDemonSwith\u003c/name\u003e\u003cemail\u003eDemonSwith\u003c/email\u003e\u003c/author\u003e\u003cid\u003etag:codecanyon.net,2007-12-31:Item/17779746\u003c/id\u003e\u003ccontent type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;DESCRIPTION :\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Business Growth Banners HTML5 Ads Template is a clean and unique design so far using the latest trendy material design for introductions company, business, promotions, marketing, make money online\u0026amp;#8230;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;BANNERS FEATURES :\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;- 06 standard size\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;- Google Ads\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;- Layered by name\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;- include psd files\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;FONTS USE :\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;+ Google font\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;NOTE\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;All the images are display only, not included in the main download package. All links download image included in file download.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Need another template or logo, please contact me directly via e-mail form on my profile page.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003eDemonSwith\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-09-05T23:34:58+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T17:04:56+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-09-05T23:34:58+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle type\u003d\"text\"\u003eOnline FM Radio with Admob (Full Applications)\u003c/title\u003e\u003clink rel\u003d\"alternate\" type\u003d\"text/html\" href\u003d\"https://codecanyon.net/item/online-fm-radio-with-admob/17778288\" /\u003e\u003cauthor\u003e\u003cname\u003eiGlyphic\u003c/name\u003e\u003cemail\u003eiGlyphic\u003c/email\u003e\u003c/author\u003e\u003cid\u003etag:codecanyon.net,2007-12-31:Item/17778288\u003c/id\u003e\u003ccontent type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This been a great app to listen radio over internet. You can add your local radio list with streaming url to configure it for your local area. User will be able to listen radio from anywhere and everywhere even if he not stay in radio network. Also there is an option to differentiate FM and Online radio. User will be able to play radio from the classified radio list. There is an option to record radio. Radio can be played in background as like other music player. In background mode a radio controller will be appeared in notification area so that user can stop, next, previous channel.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__please-check-our-demo\"\u0026gt;Please check our demo:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://drive.google.com/uc?export\u003ddownload\u0026amp;#38;id\u003d0B5REvoJ_tLa0cGxvZ1pCaldoMTA\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"https://d1a6a9r46cnyll.cloudfront.net/4a84add6401a6f132937032eda64db7efcd399a0/687474703a2f2f616e64726f69642e617070746f6469612e636f6d2f61706b5f646f776e6c6f616465725f6c6f676f2e706e67\" /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__app-features\"\u0026gt;App Features\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Play FM radio over internet\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Play online radio\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Record radio\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Play radio in background more\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Control radio by notification controller in background mode\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Navigate online and FM radio differently\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Instant and fast radio play\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Simple and great interface\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Beautiful UI/UX \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Extensive Documentation\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n        \u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__how-to-setup\"\u0026gt;How to Setup\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;1) Import/open project by Android Studio\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;2) Open build.gradle (under app directory) file and change \u0026amp;#8216;applicationId\u0026amp;#8217;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3) Open drawable, drawable-hdpi, drawable-xxhdpi directory and change app icon\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;4) Open string.xml and change \u0026amp;#8216;app_ad_id\u0026amp;#8217;, \u0026amp;#8216;banner_ad_unit_id\u0026amp;#8217; and \u0026amp;#8216;interstitial_ad_unit_id\u0026amp;#8217; by your own Ad id. If you don\u0026amp;#8217;t want to enable fullscreen/interstitial ad then you can remove \u0026amp;#8216;interstitial_ad_unit_id\u0026amp;#8217; and relevant java code\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n            \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;5) Important Point: This app included 5 radio station for testing. You have to add radio as your expectation with as JSON data. Modify \u0026amp;#8216;radio_data.json\u0026amp;#8217; in assets folder. You can add all of your local or global radio data. To add each radio you have to enter data as this format:\r\n                \u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\r\n                    \u0026lt;pre\u0026gt;\r\n{\r\n    \"radio_id\": 3,\r\n    \"radio_name\": \"Radio Today\",\r\n    \"country\": \"Bangladesh\",\r\n    \"city\": \"Dhaka\",\r\n    \"radio_type\": \"FM\",\r\n    \"streaming_url\": \"http://78.129.189.182:23809/\" \r\n\r\n}\r\n                \u0026lt;/pre\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n                \u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n                \u0026lt;pre\u0026gt;\r\n- radio_id*: Put and unique radio id for each channel\r\n- radio_name*: Put radio name here\r\n- country: Put country here, you can avoid this field if you don't want add this. This field is optional\r\n- city: Put city name. Again you can avoid this as this field also optional\r\n- radio_type*: Put radio type here. 'FM' if the radio is FM radio and 'Online' if the radio is online radio\r\n- streaming_url*: This is most important field for a radio. Find out exact streaming URL and put that here.\r\n                  There are several ways to get radio streaming URL. See 'Collect radio streaming URL' section to get tutorial.\r\n                  If you are still confused about it then please contact with us.\r\n                \u0026lt;/pre\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n            \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n        \u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id\u003dcom.codelab.radio\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"https://d1a6a9r46cnyll.cloudfront.net/20e15c055a0eaf279866ab797e90d8d63e5adb05/687474703a2f2f6f6c64656e7765622e636f6d2f73656c6c2f62746e5f676f6f676c652e706e67\" alt\u003d\"Try demo on Google Play\" title\u003d\"Try demo on Google Play\" /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://help.market.envato.com/hc/en-us/articles/203269490-How-Do-I-Give-Feedback-On-Items-?_ga\u003d1.173965923.1160179329.1456742954\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/30675090/IonFullApp%20Redesign/rate_us.png\" /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003eiGlyphic\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-09-05T21:41:32+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T19:17:45+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-09-05T21:41:32+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle type\u003d\"text\"\u003eSO Quickview - Responsive Opencart Module (OpenCart)\u003c/title\u003e\u003clink rel\u003d\"alternate\" type\u003d\"text/html\" href\u003d\"https://codecanyon.net/item/so-quickview-responsive-opencart-module/17778034\" /\u003e\u003cauthor\u003e\u003cname\u003eskyoftech\u003c/name\u003e\u003cemail\u003eskyoftech\u003c/email\u003e\u003c/author\u003e\u003cid\u003etag:codecanyon.net,2007-12-31:Item/17778034\u003c/id\u003e\u003ccontent type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__so-quickview-responsive-opencart-quickview-product-module\"\u0026gt;SO Quickview \u0026amp;#8211; Responsive Opencart Quickview Product Module\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;SO Quickview \u0026amp;#8211; A great solution to help visitors can quickly view product details on the same page by using popup window. Just simple by one click on Quickview button, your product detail will open with full necessary information like: image product, product price, description, product reviews, product attributes and link to product detail page etc. \u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\r\nYou can place Quickview button at any positions as the way you want. With SO Quickview, your customers can instantly add to the cart as well as add to wishlist, add to compare from the product popup without wasting time, this speeds up the browsing process through store. And with options in the backend, you can easily adjust width and height of this popup window. \u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Many other parameters in the admin panel can be tweaked easily to suit your needs. Let\u0026amp;#8217;s view the Demo and experience now!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__main-features\"\u0026gt;MAIN FEATURES:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Support Opencart 2.1.x, 2.2.x\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fully compatible with IE9+, Firefox 2+, Flock 0.7+, Netscape, Safari, Opera 9.5 and Chrome\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Support Responsive layout\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Support Multi-Module in the same page\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fully compatible with IE10+, Firefox 2+, Flock 0.7+, Netscape, Safari, Opera 9.5 and Chrome\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Display all product options in the quick view popup.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to add product to cart quickly.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Product preview can include: Image, Short Description, Additional information\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Allow to show price, add to cart, add to wishlist, add to compare\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Allow to change width/height of popup window\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Allow to set a timer to delay the execution of the next item in the queue.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt; \u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003eskyoftech\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-09-05T20:59:12+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T17:04:32+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-09-05T20:59:12+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle type\u003d\"text\"\u003eHalloween Breaker - HTML5 Construct Match 3 Game (Games)\u003c/title\u003e\u003clink rel\u003d\"alternate\" type\u003d\"text/html\" href\u003d\"https://codecanyon.net/item/halloween-breaker-html5-construct-match-3-game-/17777482\" /\u003e\u003cauthor\u003e\u003cname\u003ecodethislab\u003c/name\u003e\u003cemail\u003ecodethislab\u003c/email\u003e\u003c/author\u003e\u003cid\u003etag:codecanyon.net,2007-12-31:Item/17777482\u003c/id\u003e\u003ccontent type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"http://showcase.codethislab.com/games/halloween_breaker_c2/\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://showcase.codethislab.com/games/game_preview/play_images/playitnow_orange.png\" alt\u003d\"Play It Now!\" /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\r\n \r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Halloween Breaker is a HTML5 match 3 game.\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt; The goal of the game is to clear all the grid matching\r\ntwo or more blocks of the same color. The user loses a life if a single block is clicked\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n \r\n\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://showcase.codethislab.com/banners/envato/admob_banner_codecanyon.png\" alt\u003d\"Admob ads banner\" /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n \r\nThis Game is ready to be exported in Intel XDK and be used with AdmobAds\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nAdMob is currently only officially supported with the Intel® XDK\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Use the AdmobAds to add your ads\u0026amp;#8217; ID and start monetizing with this game!\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\r\nYou\u0026amp;#8217;ll find a step by step handbook about the implementation of AdmobAds \u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://www.scirra.com/manual/184/admob\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;here\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; \r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We can\u0026amp;#8217;t offer any support for uses of the game in third party software.\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Please read \u0026lt;a href\u003d\"http://showcase.codethislab.com/games/halloween_breaker_c2/readme_construct.pdf\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;the documentation\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; to get more info!\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nThis game has been developed with Construct 2: \u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://www.scirra.com/construct2\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;https://www.scirra.com/construct2\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The ZIP package contains the game at  640\u0026amp;#215;960 resolution that  scales to fit current screen device. \u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nThe game is fully compatible with all most common mobile devices. We just can\u0026amp;#8217;t ensure full compatibility with the audio on all devices.\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;WARNING:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nThe game folder contains the Capx file that can be modified with any extended version of Construct 2. \u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nWe can\u0026amp;#8217;t ensure the full screen resolution on all device.\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nThe game contains some non-native plugins / behaviors you need to install in Construct2 if you want to modify the game.\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nPlease refer to \u0026lt;a href\u003d\"http://showcase.codethislab.com/games/bones_slasher_c2/readme_construct.pdf\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;the documentation\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; for a detailed list of these plugins/behaviors and their link.\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n \r\n\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://showcase.codethislab.com/games/halloween_breaker_c2/thumbs.png\" alt\u003d\"Game Screenshoot\" /\u0026gt;\r\n \r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n \r\n\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"http://codecanyon.net/item/ctl-arcade-wordpress-plugin/13856421\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://showcase.codethislab.com/banners/envato/compatible-game.png\" alt\u003d\"CTL Arcade\" /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\r\n \u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nThis game is fully compatible with \u0026lt;a href\u003d\"http://codecanyon.net/item/ctl-arcade-wordpress-plugin/13856421\"\u0026gt;CTL Arcade\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\r\nA \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Wordpress Plugin\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; that allows you to create a real arcade on your website.\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;u\u0026gt;  \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt; Easy to Install\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;  \u0026lt;/u\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;With CTL Arcade you can: \u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Monetize\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; with your games adding \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Ads Banners\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Promote\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; your website with \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Social Share Buttons\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Improve our games with \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Leaderboard\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;, and \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Rating Feature\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u003d\u003d\u003d Even if we do our best to minimize any inconvenience, we can\u0026amp;#8217;t ensure the full compatibility of all our games on every device and every operating system update.\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nThank you for the understanding. website\u0026amp;#8217;s users can invite  their facebook friends to join your social network.Also,allow users to share your website on social networks.for eg:On \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;SocialKit?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;SocialKit\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;  is a Social Networking Platform that consists of various features including Live Chat, Pages, Groups, Messages, Stories, Comments, Likes, Shares, Notifications, #Hashtags, @Mentions, etc. It allows users to socialize with each other, share with their favorite community, connect with their favorite brands, artists, celebrities, and much more.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;h2 id\u003d\"item-description__features\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Features:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h2\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Allow users to invite their facebook friends.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Allow users to share your website on social networks.for eg:On \u0026amp;#8220;facebook,twitter,google plus,vk,linkedin etc.\u0026amp;#8221;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Drive more facebook traffic to your website.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Facebook og-meta tag support included type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Note: Before purchasing this add-on, please make sure that you purchased \u0026lt;a href\u003d\"http://codecanyon.net/item/visual-composer-page-builder-for-wordpress/242431\"\u0026gt;Visual Composer\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; plugin.\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Visual Composer Sections is an add-on that allows you to reuse sections you create on a Visual Composer page, post type or in any WordPress Sidebar using a special widget.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The one and only feature that`s missing from Visual Composer is reusing singular sections without having to reproduce them each time.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;By using this add-on you will be able to manage Visual Composer sections in one place, include them just where you need them and apply changes globally when editing.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Visual Composer Sections is a 2 in 1 plugin, also allowing you to add Visual Composer in sidebars using the same mechanism noted before (a special widget named VC Sections is available and lets you select a Section created before).\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003eWWPixels\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-09-05T06:29:55+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T18:24:20+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-09-05T06:29:55+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;h2 id\u003d\"item-description__the-woocommerce-favicon-counter-allows-you-to-set-a-favicon-with-total-number\"\u0026gt;The Woocommerce Favicon Counter allows you to set a favicon with total number item in cart onto the icon of website.\u0026lt;/h2\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;With funny icon on browser, this plugin helps to remind customers about the total number item in cart which they have and increase your sales.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Only some clicks to setup funny Favicon for your site.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h2 id\u003d\"item-description__features-list\"\u0026gt;Features list:\u0026lt;/h2\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Set a favicon with total number item in cart onto the icon of website.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Custom via Settings page.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Unlimitted Color.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Powerful Inline Preview\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;: you will see preview immediately each when edit options.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__customize-options\"\u0026gt;Customize Color\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;4 Positions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3 Shape Type\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;More options: please check fantastic HTML5 Game made with the help of Physics Game Engine called Box2D. This is likely one of the most exiting and joyful HTML5 sport recreation.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__top-features\"\u0026gt;Top Features:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;40 Different Levels Included\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build With Box2D\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Supported 10 Different Languages\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Easily Change \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Any Text or Link\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; Of The Game\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Cool \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Graphics\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Amazing\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; Sounds Effects\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Works Well On All Latest \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Browsers\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Written in \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Pure\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; JavaScript\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Clean \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Code\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Multi-Browser Compatible\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; \u0026amp;#8211; Well examined in numerous searching environments\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Extensive \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Documentation\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;24/7 Support\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__supported-languages\"\u0026gt;Supported Languages:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;ol\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;DE\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;DU\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;EN\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;ES\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;FR\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;IT\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;PT\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;RU\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;TR\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;UA\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/ol\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__documentation-support\"\u0026gt;Documentation / Support:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The documentation is extensive and point source properly properly commented and formatted, so you should not have any problem working with this item.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;If you need support, please send an email using the contact form. Please include name of the game, the game URL and detailed information about your problem. We usually respond to support requests within 24 hours on weekdays, depending on the number of requests in the queue.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003eEliteCoder\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-09-04T17:12:49+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T19:35:46+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-09-04T17:12:49+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle type\u003d\"text\"\u003eForm Designer - A JQuery Form Builder tool (Forms)\u003c/title\u003e\u003clink rel\u003d\"alternate\" type\u003d\"text/html\" href\u003d\"https://codecanyon.net/item/form-designer-a-jquery-form-builder-tool/17765354\" /\u003e\u003cauthor\u003e\u003cname\u003eDotcomfactory\u003c/name\u003e\u003cemail\u003eDotcomfactory\u003c/email\u003e\u003c/author\u003e\u003cid\u003etag:codecanyon.net,2007-12-31:Item/17765354\u003c/id\u003e\u003ccontent type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;FORM-DESIGNER is a jQuery form builder  tool which will help you to build an interactive form to use in your website template. This  is mainly a  HTML developer\u0026amp;#8217;s tool, but anyone who have a little knowledge about CSS and HTML structure and use of them,  can use this tool.\r\nI try to keep this jquery application very simple and user-friendly so that anyone can understand it within one or two tries. The help file also helps you to understand each and every part and functionality of this form generating tool.\r\nThis tool will allow you to create a custom form or redesign an existing template. You can also create a modal form here. This tool will allow you to add or delete fields from an existing template also you can edit the style and all attributes of an element (if any attributes available) just by few mouse clicks. Not only that, you can apply validation functionality to all valid element and can fix the alert text also for each element separately. In this tool you will get total 7 option to create form from 7 different template and one option to create a custom form.\r\nAs a final output,  you will get the HTML,CSS and jQuery code here.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Available Features : \r\nCustom CSS\r\n49 fonts to select,\r\nFont-awesome icons can be use,\r\nEdit/delete style or object,\r\nComplete HTML,CSS and jQuery code as output,\r\nWell documented,\r\nStep by step screenshots.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003eDotcomfactory\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-09-04T16:58:21+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T20:36:39+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-09-04T16:58:21+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle type\u003d\"text\"\u003eAdvanced HRM (Miscellaneous)\u003c/title\u003e\u003clink rel\u003d\"alternate\" type\u003d\"text/html\" href\u003d\"https://codecanyon.net/item/advanced-hrm/17767006\" /\u003e\u003cauthor\u003e\u003cname\u003ecoderpixel\u003c/name\u003e\u003cemail\u003ecoderpixel\u003c/email\u003e\u003c/author\u003e\u003cid\u003etag:codecanyon.net,2007-12-31:Item/17767006\u003c/id\u003e\u003ccontent type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://coderpixel.com/feature-image/advance-hrm-1.png\" /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://coderpixel.com/feature-image/advance-hrm-2.png\" /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;h2 id\u003d\"item-description__login-access\"\u0026gt;Login Access\u0026lt;/h2\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;h2 id\u003d\"item-description__for-admin-portal\"\u0026gt;For Admin Portal:\u0026lt;/h2\u0026gt; Social Share Pro\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; is Addon For Socialkit.This addon allow your users to share their post on whatsapp,facebook,twitter,google plus,vk,ok.ru,linkedin,pintrest,reddit,digg,tumblr,email,gmail,sms,skype,telegram,viber.\r\nTotal 17 sharing services are supported.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__\" /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What is\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;SocialKit?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;SocialKit\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;  is a Social Networking Platform that consists of various features including Live Chat, Pages, Groups, Messages, Stories, Comments, Likes, Shares, Notifications, #Hashtags, @Mentions, etc. It allows users to socialize with each other, share with their favorite community, connect with their favorite brands, artists, celebrities, and much more.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;h2 id\u003d\"item-description__features\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Features:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h2\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Allow users to share their link and text post using 17 sharing services .\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Allow users to share their timeline, group,page post and photo post using 17 sharing services .\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Facebook og-meta tags included for better sharing.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026amp;#8220;Meta-tags for your website\u0026amp;#8221; help also included for better visibility in google search.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Compatible with all browsers.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Responsive and mobile friendly design.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Well documentation added.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt; required\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Support mutliple Users, Each user can use his own Facebook account in his script posts to publish at specific time.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Comment, Publish comments to move your posts to top of news feed of Facebook\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Post Youtube video as Facebook video, just paste youtube video URL and done\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Post Facebook Public videos  as your own video, its NOT video sharing, its copying the video\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Configurable Posts Delay.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Resume/Pause/Edit/Repost Posts\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Resume/Pause/Edit/Repost Comments\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Timezone, Spintax, Nice Email template layout\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Facebook login and signup\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Support Multiple languages\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Post on pages, groups, events and profile\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Upload images from computer and mobile\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Filter closed/secrets groups on import\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Filter restricted liked pages on import\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Import groups via HTML file\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Manage Facebook app roles form script\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Reset password with your email address\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Clean, indented and well commented code for easy customization\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Well secured script to prevent XSS, CSRF, SQL injection etc.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Two Versions source code for emoji and none Collect coins and raise the level. With each new level gives extra life\r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__how-to-play-on-mobile-devices\"\u0026gt;How to play on mobile devices?\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\nTap anywhere\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__how-to-play-in-the-browser\"\u0026gt;How to play in the browser\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\nTap anywhere\r\n\u0026lt;h4 id\u003d\"item-description__features\"\u0026gt;Features\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt; type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;h2 id\u003d\"item-description__behanceian-behance-portfolio-showcase-plugin\"\u0026gt;Behanceian behance portfolio showcase plugin\u0026lt;/h2\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;h4 id\u003d\"item-description__a-plugin-for-showcase-your-behance-portfolios-in-your-wordpress-site\"\u0026gt;A plugin for showcase your Behance portfolios in your WordPress site.\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Behanceian behance portfolio showcase plugin\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; is a light weight WordPress plugin to for  behance lover. If you have a WordPress portfolios site and if you would like to show your portfolios from your behance account then you may choose this plugin. It\u0026amp;#8217;s very easy to use and have lot\u0026amp;#8217;s of multiple features. We will recommend you to use this plugin.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h5 id\u003d\"item-description__here-is-some-basic-features-of-this-plugin\"\u0026gt;Here is some basic features of this plugin:\u0026lt;/h5\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;ol\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Grids with multiple columns.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Responsive and masonary grids.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;8 multiple grid effects.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Can show grids using shortcodes.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Shortcode, widget supported and php code supported.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Columns are changeable.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Very nice option panel.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Easy to use.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Well documented.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/ol\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h5 id\u003d\"item-description__sources-and-credit\"\u0026gt;Sources and credit\u0026lt;/h5\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"http://tympanus.net/codrops/2013/07/02/loading-effects-for-grid-items-with-css-animations/\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;Loading Effects for Grid Items with CSS Animations\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"http://behance.com\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;Behance API\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003eThemeAtelier\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-09-04T05:21:22+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T05:40:11+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-09-04T05:21:22+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle /\u003e\u003cauthor\u003e\u003cname\u003eWildRocketDev\u003c/name\u003e\u003cemail\u003eWildRocketDev\u003c/email\u003e\u003c/author\u003e\u003cid\u003etag:codecanyon.net,2007-12-31:Item/17762061\u003c/id\u003e\u003ccontent type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Host and view your own powerful real-time website analytics.\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;EmbedAlytics is an incredibly powerful analytic solution allowing you to install, configure and then embed your dashboard directly into any website of your choice. Instead of logging into an analytic system \u0026amp;#8211; just place one of our snippets of code into your Wordpress, Magento, Prestashop, custom admin panels \u0026amp;#8230; (the list is endless!) and enjoy powerful data at your fingertips.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Main Features\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\r\n- Full analytic package with 15+ metrics collected\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Simple and easy installation on all systems that have PHP and MYSQL (5 minute installation promise!)\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Embeddable, live dashboards\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Real time visitor information like Google Analytics\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Two themes pre-installed\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Powerful API system to make your own dashboards\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Self-host all your data!\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What makes this product valuable is that it only takes 5 minutes to install:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n- Upload files\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Run through the easy installation system\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Install tracking code (on every page you want to track)\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Embed a dashboard\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;If you cannot install the system, \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;let us know and we\u0026amp;#8217;ll do it for you!\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; \u0026lt;em\u0026gt;(One time per purchase)\u0026lt;/em\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://wildrocket.io/embedalytics/screen_dog.png\" /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Metrics collected and reported:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n- Unique visitors\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Page visited\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- What device type was used\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Referer\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Location \u0026amp;#8211; Country and City\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Operating systems and version number\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Browser and version number\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Time on site\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Page load time (on supported browsers)\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- System render time\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Site entry and exit pages\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Live site users and pageviews\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n- Bounce rate\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003eWildRocketDev\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-09-04T05:06:35+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T16:40:50+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-09-04T05:06:35+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle type\u003d\"text\"\u003eBilliards - HTML5 Game + Android + AdMob (Capx) (Games)\u003c/title\u003e\u003clink rel\u003d\"alternate\" type\u003d\"text/html\" href\u003d\"https://codecanyon.net/item/billiards-html5-game-android-admob-capx/17760760\" /\u003e\u003cauthor\u003e\u003cname\u003eGamesMasters\u003c/name\u003e\u003cemail\u003eGamesMasters\u003c/email\u003e\u003c/author\u003e\u003cid\u003etag:codecanyon.net,2007-12-31:Item/17760760\u003c/id\u003e\u003ccontent type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;h4 id\u003d\"item-description__billiards\"\u0026gt;Billiards \u0026amp;#8211; HTML5 Game + Android + AdMob (Capx)\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__description\"\u0026gt;Description:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h4 id\u003d\"item-description__description\"\u0026gt;This billiard game is based on speed and your goal is to pocket all balls as soon as possible. There are 15 balls and the game finishes after all balls are pocketed. Your record is based on how many seconds you have spent for pocketing all balls and this will be considered as your final record. Made in Construct 2. Enjoy the game!\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__features\"\u0026gt;Features:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    Full Game;\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    One-Touch Control;\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    Simple Gameplay;\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    Easy to Reskin;\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    Easy to Add Content;\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    Easy to Change Source;\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    Touch \u0026amp;#38; Mouse;\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    Sound Fx;\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    High Resolution: 1280\u0026amp;#215;720px;\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    Online Support 24/7;\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    AdMob-ADS;\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    No Programming Knowledge Needed!\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    HTML5 Project Events:53;\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    MOBILE Project Events:61;\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\r\n    Including Constuct 2 file (.capx \u0026amp;#8211; all source).\r\n  \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h4 You can add your local radio list with streaming url to configure it for ...","content":"\u003cp\u003eThis been a great app to listen radio over internet. You can add your local radio list with streaming url to configure it for your local area. User will be able to listen radio from anywhere and everywhere even if he not stay in radio network. Also there is an option to differentiate FM and Online radio. User will be able to play radio from the classified radio list. There is an option to record radio. Radio can be played in background as like other music player. In background mode a radio controller will be appeared in notification area so that user can stop, next, previous channel.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\u003ch3\u003ePlease check our demo:\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\n\u003ca href\u003d\"https://drive.google.com/uc?export\u003ddownload\u0026amp;id\u003d0B5REvoJ_tLa0cGxvZ1pCaldoMTA\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u003e\u003cimg src\u003d\"https://d1a6a9r46cnyll.cloudfront.net/4a84add6401a6f132937032eda64db7efcd399a0/687474703a2f2f616e64726f69642e617070746f6469612e636f6d2f61706b5f646f776e6c6f616465725f6c6f676f2e706e67\"\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003eApp Features\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003cul\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003ePlay FM radio over internet\u003c/li\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003ePlay online radio\u003c/li\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003eRecord radio\u003c/li\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003ePlay radio in background more\u003c/li\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003eControl radio by notification controller in background mode\u003c/li\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003eNavigate online and FM radio differently\u003c/li\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003eInstant and fast radio play\u003c/li\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003eSimple and great interface\u003c/li\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003eBeautiful UI/UX \u003c/li\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003eExtensive Documentation\u003c/li\u003e\n        \u003c/ul\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003eHow to Setup\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cul\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003e1) Import/open project by Android Studio\u003c/li\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003e2) Open build.gradle (under app directory) file and change ‘applicationId’\u003c/li\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003e3) Open drawable, drawable-hdpi, drawable-xxhdpi directory and change app icon\u003c/li\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003e4) Open string.xml and change ‘app_ad_id’, ‘banner_ad_unit_id’ and ‘interstitial_ad_unit_id’ by your own Ad id. If you don’t want to enable fullscreen/interstitial ad then you can remove ‘interstitial_ad_unit_id’ and relevant java code\u003c/li\u003e\n            \u003cli\u003e5) Important Point: This app included 5 radio station for testing. You have to add radio as your expectation with as JSON data. Modify ‘radio_data.json’ in assets folder. You can add all of your local or global radio data. To add each radio you have to enter data as this format:\n                \u003cp\u003e\n                    \u003cpre\u003e\n{\n    \"radio_id\": 3,\n    \"radio_name\": \"Radio Today\",\n    \"country\": \"Bangladesh\",\n    \"city\": \"Dhaka\",\n    \"radio_type\": \"FM\",\n    \"streaming_url\": \"http://78.129.189.182:23809/\" \n\n}\n                \u003c/pre\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n                \u003cbr\u003e\n                \u003cpre\u003e\n- radio_id*: Put and unique radio id for each channel\n- radio_name*: Put radio name here\n- country: Put country here, you can avoid this field if you don't want add this. This field is optional\n- city: Put city name. Again you can avoid this as this field also optional\n- radio_type*: Put radio type here. 'FM' if the radio is FM radio and 'Online' if the radio is online radio\n- streaming_url*: This is most important field for a radio. Find out exact streaming URL and put that here.\n                  There are several ways to get radio streaming URL. See 'Collect radio streaming URL' section to get tutorial.\n                  If you are still confused about it then please contact with us.\n                \u003c/pre\u003e\n\n            \u003c/li\u003e\n        \u003c/ul\u003e\n\n\t\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003ca href\u003d\"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id\u003dcom.codelab.radio\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u003e\u003cimg src\u003d\"https://d1a6a9r46cnyll.cloudfront.net/20e15c055a0eaf279866ab797e90d8d63e5adb05/687474703a2f2f6f6c64656e7765622e636f6d2f73656c6c2f62746e5f676f6f676c652e706e67\" alt\u003d\"Try demo on Google Play\" title\u003d\"Try demo on Google Play\"\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003ca href\u003d\"https://help.market.envato.com/hc/en-us/articles/203269490-How-Do-I-Give-Feedback-On-Items-?_ga\u003d1.173965923.1160179329.1456742954\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u003e\u003cimg src\u003d\"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/30675090/IonFullApp%20Redesign/rate_us.png\"\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","categories":[]},{"title":"SO Quickview - Responsive Opencart Module (OpenCart)","link":"https://codecanyon.net/item/so-quickview-responsive-opencart-module/17778034","author":"skyoftech","publishedDate":"Mon, 05 Sep 2016 03:59:12 -0700","contentSnippet":"SO Quickview – Responsive Opencart Quickview Product Module\n\nSO Quickview – A great solution to help visitors can quickly view ...","content":"\u003ch3\u003eSO Quickview – Responsive Opencart Quickview Product Module\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eSO Quickview – A great solution to help visitors can quickly view product details on the same page by using popup window. Just simple by one click on Quickview button, your product detail will open with full necessary information like: image product, product price, description, product reviews, product attributes and link to product detail page etc. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\nYou can place Quickview button at any positions as the way you want. With SO Quickview, your customers can instantly add to the cart as well as add to wishlist, add to compare from the product popup without wasting time, this speeds up the browsing process through store. And with options in the backend, you can easily adjust width and height of this popup window. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eMany other parameters in the admin panel can be tweaked easily to suit your needs. (Games)","link":"https://codecanyon.net/item/shoot-the-aliens/17774442","author":"elielbonyoficial","publishedDate":"Sun, 04 Sep 2016 21:00:09 -0700","contentSnippet":"Urgent Alert !!! Sidebar using a special widget.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\t\u003cp\u003eThe one and only feature that`s missing from Visual Composer is reusing singular sections without having to reproduce them each behance portfolio showcase plugin (Galleries)","link":"https://codecanyon.net/item/behanceian-behance-portfolio-showcase-plugin/17762179","author":"ThemeAtelier","publishedDate":"Sat, 03 Sep 2016 12:21:22 -0700","contentSnippet":"Behanceian behance portfolio showcase plugin\nA plugin for showcase your Behance portfolios in your WordPress site.\n\n\tBehanceian ...","content":"\u003ch2\u003eBehanceian behance portfolio showcase plugin\u003c/h2\u003e\n\u003ch4\u003eA plugin for showcase your Behance portfolios in your WordPress site.\u003c/h4\u003e\n\n\t\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eBehanceian behance portfolio showcase plugin\u003c/strong\u003e is a light weight WordPress plugin to for  behance lover. If you have a WordPress portfolios site and if you would like to show your portfolios from your behance account then you may choose this plugin. It’s very easy to use and have lot’s of multiple features. We will recommend you to use this plugin.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\u003ch5\u003eHere is some basic features of this plugin:\u003c/h5\u003e\n\u003col\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eGrids with multiple columns.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eResponsive and masonary grids.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e8 multiple grid effects.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eCan show grids using shortcodes.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eShortcode, widget supported and php code supported.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eColumns are changeable.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eVery nice option panel.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eEasy to use.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eWell documented.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ol\u003e\n\n\u003ch5\u003eSources and credit\u003c/h5\u003e\n\u003cul\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003ca href\u003d\"http://tympanus.net/codrops/2013/07/02/loading-effects-for-grid-items-with-css-animations/\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u003eLoading Effects for Grid Items with CSS Animations\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003ca href\u003d\"http://behance.com\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u003eBehance API\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e","categories":[]},{"title":"EmbedAlytics (Miscellaneous)","link":"https://codecanyon.net/item/embedalytics/17762061","author":"WildRocketDev","publishedDate":"Sat, 03 Sep 2016 12:06:35 -0700","contentSnippet":"Host and view your own powerful real-time website analytics.\nEmbedAlytics is an incredibly powerful analytic solution allowing ...","content":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eHost and view your own powerful real-time website analytics.\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eEmbedAlytics is an incredibly powerful analytic solution allowing you to install, configure and then embed your dashboard directly into any website of your choice. Instead of logging into an analytic system – just place one of our snippets of code into your Wordpress, Magento, Prestashop, custom admin panels … (the list is endless!) and enjoy powerful data at your fingertips.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eMain Features\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\n- Full analytic package with 15+ metrics collected\u003cbr\u003e\n- Simple and easy installation on all systems that have PHP and MYSQL (5 minute installation promise!)\u003cbr\u003e\n- Embeddable, live dashboards\u003cbr\u003e\n- Real time visitor information like Google Analytics\u003cbr\u003e\n- Two themes pre-installed\u003cbr\u003e\n- Powerful API system to make your own dashboards\u003cbr\u003e\n- Self-host all your data!\u003cbr\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhat makes this product valuable is that it only takes 5 minutes to install:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n- Upload
